Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Limits New York City water board's authority to increase rates charged
Summary: Limits New York City water board's authority to increase rates charged by no more than 5% annually or current rate of inflation, whichever is greater.
LawCode: Amd ยง1045-j, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to increases in fees, rates, rents or other charges established by the New York city water board
